snippet: HALPERT--Carolyn McDaniel. The Methodist Home for Nursing and Rehabilitation notes with sorrow the passing of our esteemed, very active Board member, Carolyn Halpert. Her hard work on behalf of the residents will be sorely missed, as well as her gracious presence at our meetings. We extend our sincere condolences to her family and her fellow parishioners at Christ Church United Methodist, where a memorial service will be held on Sunday, January 10 at 2pm. Methodist Home for Nursing and Rehabilitation Maria Perez, Chief Executive Officer Graham Relf, President, Board of Directors 1/3
